rules.description: Command + ` Grave Accent, Tilde to Esc
command or opt + Esc, Tilde to `
left_shift + a s d to Control + arrow, ijkl to arrow
Capslock(right_option) + a s d to Control + arrow, ijkl to arrow
Map Ctrl-Backspace to forward Delete (forward delete one character at a time).
Left Ctrl, Left Shift + ; ' . / to home end pageup pagedown
Command + ` Grave Accent, Tilde to Esc
command or opt + Esc, Tilde to `
Capslock(right_option) + a s d to Control + arrow, ijkl to arrow
left_shift + a s d to Control + arrow, ijkl to arrow
Map Ctrl-Backspace to forward Delete (forward delete one character at a time).
Left Shift + ; ' . / to home end pageup pagedown
Command + ` Grave Accent, Tilde to Esc
command or opt + Esc, Tilde to `
Capslock(right_option) + q(a) w(s) e(d) to Control + arrow
Map Ctrl-Backspace to forward Delete (forward delete one character at a time).
